I know it's hard to keep up, in my case I'm sleeping when most of the
fightings been going on, here ya go Jeremiah

Razor Claw (Pay attention people there are two at the battle mine has a
space in his name.) rushes to the side where the G1 Predacons are moving on
them. The mutant wolverine leaps forward in an attempt to land on Tantrums
back.



> OOC: Since there is so much going on, if I miss something, like an attack
> tell me. It wont be because im ignoring it, its just that there are so
many
> to remember.
>
>
> Tantrum whilred around seing Streetwis shoot at him. He got his arm up
just
> in time for it to be blasted. A thin strip of his metal was ripped away,
> like peeling dead skin of a cut. He snarled in pain. He looked down, and
> his eyes were glowing red now. "Grrrrrrr, I dont know how you managed to
> live this long Autobot, but today is your last day," he threatened,
soaring
> upwards, and firring from his horns, to continues streams of electricity.
>
> Sinnertwin had too many targets to pick. He looked around like, and
> confused. He then noticed the Autobot First Aid, staying away from the
> fight. "We hunt" one head yelled, then the other snapped at it, "No I
hunt"
> he shrieked. Sinnertwin leapt forward, and broke out into a run towards
> First Aid, firing three blasts of continues fire, on from his cannon, and
> the others from each mouth.
>
>
> Headstrong stopped when he notice the robot he was charging leave. He
> jumped, and dug his feet into the ground, stoping himself, while tearing
up
> fresh dirt. He spun around, 180 degrees, and saw Streetwise firing on
> Tantrum. "*Snort* Didnt know there would be AUtobots here" he said, as he
> fired two laser blasts at the former Autobot.
>
>
